author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of the CITU-affiliated Railway Goodshed Workers Union staged a demonstration here on Thursday demanding that better facilities be provided at the work place.

S.M. Palanisamy, deputy secretary of the union, said that there were no toilets for the workers.“We want the workers to be brought under ESI, and PF, and provide them identity cards,” he said.
title: Demonstration held
